newsitem.title: USA: Bob Dole, just another guy on the street.
newsitem.headline: Bob Dole, just another guy on the street.

text.p: Former Republican presidential candidate Bob Dole, who said if he lost he would be just another man without a title, proved it on Thursday.

He left his Watergate apartment complex this morning with a bundle of clothes under his arm and took them to the dry cleaners across the street like other residents in the Foggy Bottom area of Washington.

The former senator, who had been surrounded by staff for most of his political life during 35 years in Washington, then bought a couple of coffees at a nearby restaurant and gave one to his wife, Elizabeth. Then the couple walked their miniature schnauzer dog, Leader, around the neighbourhood.
Dole was driven off later to have pictures taken with his staff now dismantling his campaign headquarters across town.
